name.jp: 南アフリカ共和国マント

description.en: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of South Africa on it.
description.ar: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of South Africa on it.
description.br: Esta capa tem uma representação de corpo inteiro da bandeira da África do Sul.
description.cns: 这件披风上有南非国旗的图案。
description.de: Dieser Umhang zeigt die Flagge von Südafrika.
description.fi: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of South Africa on it.
description.fil: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of South Africa on it.
description.fr: Cette cape est décorée sur sa longueur du drapeau de l'Afrique du Sud.
description.id: Cloak ini memiliki penggambaran penuh bendera Afrika Selatan di atasnya.
description.it: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of South Africa on it.
description.jp: このマントには南アフリカの国旗が描かれています。
description.kr: 이 망토에는 남아프리카 공화국의 국기가 전면적으로 묘사되어 있다.
description.nl: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of South Africa on it.
description.pl: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of South Africa on it.
description.ru: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of South Africa on it.
description.sp: Esta Capa tiene una representación de cuerpo entero de la bandera de Sudáfrica.
description.sw: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of South Africa on it.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมนี้มีภาพธงชาติแอฟริกาใต้แบบเต็มความยาว
description.vi: Chiếc áo choàng này có độ dài đầy đủ mô tả lá cờ của Nam Phi trên đó.
